title: Eddie Apologizes To His Wife ON THE AIR! + Disney Character Game + Bobby Opens The Listener Mailbag!
itunes:title: Eddie Apologizes To His Wife ON THE AIR! + Disney Character Game + Bobby Opens The Listener Mailbag!
description:
Eddie accused his wife of taking his wallet for two days before finding it...under the seat of HIS vehicle! He takes to the air to publicly apologize. We play a fun Disney character game where show members have to identify types of animals. Plus, Bobby opens up mailbag to answer questions from listeners!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
